import React,{useState} from "react"; import IndexIcons from "./IndexIcons"; const Outline=(props)=>{ const [index,setIndex]=useState(0) const opts=[["Equidistant Cities",'eq'],["Large Cities","lg"]] const outlinedArr=props.outline.map=((stop,i)=>{ return(

{""+(i+1)+"."}

{stop['name']+","}

{stop['country']}

Population:{stop['population']}

Distance to Next Stop:{stop['distanceNext']}

) }) console.log('outlinedarr',outlinedArr) const scroll=(num)=>{ if((num===1&&index>=outlinedArr.length-2)||(num===0&&index===0)){ return } setIndex(index+num) } return(
{outlinedArr[index]} {outlinedArr[index+1]}
{e.preventDefault()}}>
) } export default Outline
